title: French government toppled in no-confidence vote brought by opposition
content: The French government has been ousted in a vote of no-confidence, plunging the euro zone's second-largest country into deep political and economic uncertainty.
summary: The French government has been ousted in a vote of no-confidence, plunging the euro zone's second-largest country into deep political and economic uncertainty.

title: South Korea's short-lived martial law declaration rattled markets. Here's what's next for stocks
content: An extraordinary political drama in South Korea is likely to compound an already gloomy outlook for Asia's fourth-largest economy, analysts say.
summary: An extraordinary political drama in South Korea is likely to compound an already gloomy outlook for Asia's fourth-largest economy, analysts say.

title: Powell says he's not worried about the Fed losing its independence under Trump
content: Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell spoke Wednesday at the New York Times DealBook conference.

title: UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson fatally shot in New York in targeted attack
content: Thompson, who led the largest private insurer in the U.S., was set to attend UnitedHealth Group's investor day, which the company canceled.
summary: Thompson, who led the largest private insurer in the U.S., was set to attend UnitedHealth Group's investor day, which the company canceled.

content: President-elect Donald Trump announced that Peter Navarro will serve as "Senior Counselor for Trade and Manufacturing" in his next White House term.

title: I’ve travelled to 40 countries with my aging parents. It's 'the best investment I've ever made'
content: Near-death experiences in Zimbabwe, road trips to nowhere in Cuba. Media executive Todd Miller details how his family used humor to deal with disasters abroad.
summary: Near-death experiences in Zimbabwe, road trips to nowhere in Cuba. Media executive Todd Miller details how his family used humor to deal with disasters abroad.

title: Amazon sued by DC attorney general for allegedly excluding neighborhoods from Prime delivery
content: Amazon's actions caused more than 48,000 Prime members to get slower delivery than the rest of the capital city, Attorney General Brian Schwalb claimed.
summary: Amazon's actions caused more than 48,000 Prime members to get slower delivery than the rest of the capital city, Attorney General Brian Schwalb claimed.

title: Contentious budget plans are wreaking political havoc across Europe
content: Post-pandemic fiscal rules are putting pressure on even the most hawkish EU members in the euro zone.

title: GM expects more than $5 billion impact from China restructuring, including plant closures
content: General Motors expects a restructuring of its joint venture operations with SAIC Motor in China to cost more than $5 billion in noncash charges and write-downs.
summary: General Motors expects a restructuring of its joint venture operations with SAIC Motor in China to cost more than $5 billion in noncash charges and write-downs.

title: Britain wants to take the U.S. on as a global crypto hub — but the industry has its doubts

title: CNBC Daily Open: U.S. stocks start December chilly; Korea stocks tumble on political chaos

title: Australia's third-quarter GDP grows at a slower-than-expected 0.3% amid higher rates and sticky inflation
content: Australia's economy grew at slower than expected in the third quarter, as elevated borrowing costs and sticky inflation continued to weigh down on the slowing economy.
summary: Australia's economy grew at slower than expected in the third quarter, as elevated borrowing costs and sticky inflation continued to weigh down on the slowing economy.

title: South Korean won falls, but is off lows amid political chaos in country
content: South Korea's won on Tuesday cut losses after the country's parliament swiftly passed a resolution to demand the lifting of martial law.
summary: South Korea's won on Tuesday cut losses after the country's parliament swiftly passed a resolution to demand the lifting of martial law.

title: As global defense spending surges, South Korean arms makers look like a clear winner
content: A steady increase in global expenditure, combined with growing geopolitical uncertainties has provided South Korean arms makers with larger global markets.

title: Microsoft faces £1 billion lawsuit in UK for allegedly overcharging rival cloud firms' customers
content: Microsoft was accused of unfairly overcharging customers of rival cloud companies including Amazon, Google and Alibaba Cloud in a U.K. lawsuit filed Tuesday.

title: OpenAI hires first marketing chief from Coinbase
content: OpenAI said on Tuesday that it's hired Kate Rouch from Coinbase as its first chief marketing officer.

title: Apple says it uses Amazon's custom AI chips
content: Apple is currently using Amazon Web Services' custom AI chips for services like searching and will evaluate if its latest AI chip can be used to pre-train its AI models like Apple Intelligence.
summary: Apple is currently using Amazon Web Services' custom AI chips for services like searching and will evaluate if its latest AI chip can be used to pre-train its AI models like Apple Intelligence.

title: 'Realistic' green policies good for the U.S., Aramco CEO says, with Trump to return to White House

title: China's AI balancing act — beating the U.S. but keeping the tech from threatening Beijing's rule

title: Jaguar reveals 'Type 00' concept car, first under controversial new brand identity
